snippet: The owner of the struggling Trump Taj Mahal Casino Resort filed court papers on Friday saying it would close next month.
abstract: Trump Entertainment Resorts, owner of struggling Trump Taj Mahal Casino Resort in Atlantic City, files court papers saying its board has approved casino's shutdown by Dec 12.
lead_paragraph: The owner of the struggling Trump Taj Mahal Casino Resort filed court papers on Friday saying it would close next month.

headline.main: Trump Taj Mahal Will Be 5th Atlantic City Casino to Close This Year
headline.print_headline: Trump Taj Mahal to Be Fifth Casino to Close in Atlantic City This Year
